snippet: Puerto Rico's financially struggling public power company won a big reprieve Thursday, announcing that creditors agreed to postpone payment of $671 million worth of bank loans until next year....

headline.print_headline: Loan Payment Delayed for Puerto Rico Power Company
headline.main: Loan Payment Delayed for Puerto Rico Power Company

lead_paragraph: Puerto Rico's financially struggling public power company won a big reprieve Thursday, announcing that creditors agreed to postpone payment of $671 million worth of bank loans until next year.
